author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
review: A story of love, wealth, and tragedy set in the roaring twenties.

author: Harper Lee
review: A powerful story of racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

author: George Orwell
review: A dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian regime and its impact on individual freedom.

author: J. D. Salinger
review: A coming-of-age novel narrated by a teenager dealing with alienation and identity.

author: Jane Austen
review: A witty and romantic portrayal of societal norms and love in Georgian England.

review: A philosophical novel about finding one's destiny and following dreams.
